page.title: 17THE GARDEN SHOP CONT.
page.content: The Garden Shop also sells potted plants. The dearest Â£50. Most plants are sold in May and June, when they sell a lot of bedding plants as well.There is interest in gardening as the country is in a period of unemployment. The shop sells tools and chemical sprays and fertilizers. They also sell pet food and different things for pets. A Visit to a Garden The garden has lots of sections. The front was for flowers. You go through arches to secret little gardens,so it was like you were exploring all the time. The back was vegetables and fruit, strawberries,apples,peas,blackberries, gooseberries. The vegetables are grown in diffrent areas each year,carrots, spinach,beetroots,radishes,pasnips, potatoes.Crops are switched around.
